title: Perfect Weekend Coastal Getaway
description: Enjoy a relaxing coastal getaway in the stunning town of Rockingham, only 45-minutesâ€™ drive from Perth. In this laidback seaside location, you can stroll along the beach, dine in fantastic restaurants or venture to nearby wildlife reserves. Experience all this with a stay at Quest Rockingham, a collection of chic studios and apartments that will offer all the home comforts you need during your escape. Enjoy a welcome bottle of red or white wine on arrival and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout.
